"@apollo/client";</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const link = new ApolloLink( ( operation, forward ) =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;">	<span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">operation.setContext();</b></span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return forward( operation );</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="160" width="450" x="110" y="270" as="geometry" /> height="210" width="480" x="95" y="550" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-27" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="<div style="line-height: 160%;">import { ApolloLink } from "@apollo/client";</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const link = new ApolloLink( ( operation, forward ) =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;">	<span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">operation.setContext( { myValue : 100 } );</b></span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return forward( operation );</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="160" width="450" x="110" y="570" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-30" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="310" width="480" x="95" y="1130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> style="line-height: 160%;">import { ApolloLink } from "@apollo/client";</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const link = new ApolloLink( ( operation, forward ) =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;">	<span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">operation.setContext( (context) =&gt; {</b></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	...context,</span><br></span></b></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	myValue: 100</span><br></span></span></b></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>};</span><br></b></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>} );</b></span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return forward( operation );</span><br></div><div rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
